mapper.select: SELECT cc.cost_center_id AS costCenterId, cc.cost_center_code AS costCenterCode, cc.cost_center_name AS costCenterName, cc.department_id AS departmentId, d.department_name AS departmentName, cc.manager_id AS managerId, e.employee_name AS managerName, cc.create_date AS createDate, cc.status FROM erp_cost_center cc LEFT JOIN erp_department d ON cc.department_id = d.department_id LEFT JOIN erp_employee e ON cc.manager_id = e.employee_id WHERE cc.cost_center_id = #{costCenterId} AND cc.period = #{period}

SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'DIRECT' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS directCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'INDIRECT' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS indirectCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_category = 'LABOR' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS laborCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_category = 'MATERIAL' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS materialCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_category = 'OVERHEAD' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS overheadCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_category = 'OTHER' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS otherCost FROM erp_cost_center_cost WHERE cost_center_id = #{costCenterId} AND period = #{period}

SELECT cost_item_id AS costItemId, cost_item_name AS costItemName, cost_type AS costType, cost_category AS costCategory, amount, budget_amount AS budgetAmount, (amount - budget_amount) AS variance, CASE WHEN budget_amount > 0 THEN (amount - budget_amount) / budget_amount * 100 ELSE 0 END AS variancePercentage FROM erp_cost_center_cost_detail WHERE cost_center_id = #{costCenterId} AND period = #{period} ORDER BY cost_category, cost_type, amount DESC

SELECT cc.cost_center_id AS costCenterId, cc.cost_center_name AS costCenterName, cca.total_cost AS totalCost, cca.previous_period_cost AS previousPeriodCost, cca.cost_variance AS costVariance, cca.cost_variance_percentage AS costVariancePercentage, cca.ytd_cost AS ytdCost, cca.annual_budget AS annualBudget, cca.budget_utilization_percentage AS budgetUtilizationPercentage, cca.cost_per_unit AS costPerUnit, cca.efficiency_index AS efficiencyIndex FROM erp_cost_center cc JOIN erp_cost_center_analysis cca ON cc.cost_center_id = cca.cost_center_id WHERE cc.cost_center_id = #{costCenterId} AND cca.period = #{period}

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_code AS productCode, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_category AS productCategory, p.unit_of_measure AS unitOfMeasure, p.status, p.launch_date AS launchDate FROM erp_product p WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'DIRECT_MATERIAL' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS directMaterialCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'DIRECT_LABOR' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS directLaborCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'MANUFACTURING_OVERHEAD' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS manufacturingOverheadCost, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_type = 'NON_MANUFACTURING_COST' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS nonManufacturingCost, pc.standard_cost AS standardCost, pc.actual_cost AS actualCost, pc.cost_variance AS costVariance, pc.cost_variance_percentage AS costVariancePercentage FROM erp_product_cost pc JOIN erp_product_cost_detail pcd ON pc.product_cost_id = pcd.product_cost_id WHERE pc.product_id = #{productId} AND pc.period = #{period} GROUP BY pc.product_cost_id, pc.standard_cost, pc.actual_cost, pc.cost_variance, pc.cost_variance_percentage

SELECT cost_type AS costType, cost_item AS costItem, amount, percentage, standard_amount AS standardAmount, (amount - standard_amount) AS variance, CASE WHEN standard_amount > 0 THEN (amount - standard_amount) / standard_amount * 100 ELSE 0 END AS variancePercentage FROM erp_product_cost_composition WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND period = #{period} ORDER BY cost_type, amount DESC

SELECT period, total_cost AS totalCost, direct_material_cost AS directMaterialCost, direct_labor_cost AS directLaborCost, manufacturing_overhead_cost AS manufacturingOverheadCost, unit_cost AS unitCost, production_volume AS productionVolume FROM erp_product_cost_trend WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND period <= #{period} ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT optimization_id AS optimizationId, area, suggestion, potential_saving AS potentialSaving, implementation_difficulty AS implementationDifficulty, priority FROM erp_product_cost_optimization WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND period = #{period} ORDER BY priority ASC
SELECT activity_id AS activityId, activity_name AS activityName, cost_amount AS costAmount FROM erp_activity_cost_pool WHERE period = #{period} ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT driver_id AS driverId, driver_name AS driverName, driver_unit AS driverUnit, driver_quantity AS driverQuantity FROM erp_cost_driver WHERE period = #{period}

SELECT acp.activity_id AS activityId, acp.activity_name AS activityName, cd.driver_id AS driverId, cd.driver_name AS driverName, (acp.cost_amount / cd.driver_quantity) AS rate FROM erp_activity_cost_pool acp JOIN erp_cost_driver cd ON acp.driver_id = cd.driver_id WHERE acp.period = #{period} AND cd.period = #{period}

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, pa.activity_id AS activityId, a.activity_name AS activityName, pa.driver_quantity AS driverQuantity, pa.activity_cost AS activityCost, pa.traditional_cost AS traditionalCost, (pa.activity_cost - pa.traditional_cost) AS costDifference, CASE WHEN pa.traditional_cost > 0 THEN (pa.activity_cost - pa.traditional_cost) / pa.traditional_cost * 100 ELSE 0 END AS costDifferencePercentage FROM erp_product_activity pa JOIN erp_product p ON pa.product_id = p.product_id JOIN erp_activity a ON pa.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE pa.period = #{period} ORDER BY p.product_id, pa.activity_cost DESC

SELECT a.activity_id AS activityId, a.activity_name AS activityName, ava.cost_amount AS costAmount, ava.value_added_percentage AS valueAddedPercentage, ava.non_value_added_percentage AS nonValueAddedPercentage, ava.value_classification AS valueClassification, ava.improvement_potential AS improvementPotential FROM erp_activity a JOIN erp_activity_value_analysis ava ON a.activity_id = ava.activity_id WHERE ava.period = #{period} ORDER BY ava.value_added_percentage DESC
